english.segment1: The dial tone is misleading my heart.
english.segment3: They say its fine for you to have a self centered point of view.
english.segment4: Im alone and the telephone asks me where you are.
english.segment5: Spiraling up the cord i caught your perfect little lie.
english.segment6: Dont stay. I never knew you anyways
english.segment7: Dont stay. Save your own skin
english.segment8: Dont stay. While you go, go dig deep a foxhole for one.
english.segment9: Red as wine I see the drugs in your eyes.
english.segment11: Ive had it up to here with your stupid little point of view
english.segment12: So put on your shoes! yeah go drink your booze!
english.segment13: Youve drained all of my sympathy.
english.segment14: Let me be so I can gracefully resign.
